subject: Communication
title: Constructive vs. Destructive Conflict
description: Learn Constructive vs. Destructive Conflict in one minute.

hook.text: A team that never argues ships a flawed product. A team that argues passionately ships a breakthrough. What happened?

buildup.text: Constructive conflict challenges ideas while respecting people.

discovery.text: Patrick Lencioni found that teams avoiding conflict make worse decisions than teams that engage in healthy debate.

climax.text: The goal isn't to eliminate conflict. It's to channel it constructively â€” toward better outcomes, not personal attacks.

punchline.text: Good conflict attacks problems. Bad conflict attacks people.
